name: Football Manager Touch 2018
description:
With over 2500 clubs to choose from and over 190,000 real footballers and staff to sign, Touch packs the depth and power of Football Manager’s acclaimed data but focuses on the core managerial duties only – tactics and transfers. There’s no media circus around here, so you’ll find it much faster between games and complete seasons quicker.
For managers in even more of a hurry, Touch lets you simulate your matches with a single click of a button, leaving your backroom staff to guide the team in your absence. If you’re a football purist, you can watch your footballing vision unfold before your very eyes on our acclaimed 3D match engine.
Fans who pre-purchase Football Manager Touch 2018 will also enjoy access to a fully-playable Beta version of the game, meaning you can start ‘pre-season’ at least two weeks prior to the November 10th release date. Careers started in this Beta version will continue in the full game.
